message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start the conversation. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
